ComicInfo.Title: Rosie Meets Marty the Punk Rocker!; Whatever-I-Feel-Like Comix; Puttin' On the Glitz; Battleground: Dinnertable!; Police May Have Erred in Slaying!; Jazzer Bunch; Psychopathia Sexualis; In My Room; Not Funny Not Funny Not Funny Not Funny Not Funny Not Funny...

ComicInfo.Summary:
Tootles goes shopping
Madame X accosts the military
Marty visits the diner
The philosophy of sex.
How to disguise the effects of aging.
The dysfunctional family at the dinner table.
The police kill the wrong person
The Bunch takes up aerobics
Several cases of sexual pathology are illustrated using excerpts from Dr. R. Von Krafft-Ebing's "Psychopathia Sexualis."
The loner in his room
